name: Flipside (Hinkenborp)
description:
Our team submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 - And our first game ever!

We have NEVER made a game, so for this Game Jam our goal was to create a playable prototype where you can control a character in a world of all original assets created by our team.

We had many setbacks along the way but we are super proud of having met our goal of a playable prototype before the deadline!
